name: College Cash
description: College Cash uses everyday behavior to reduce student loan debt in a unique manner, including user-generated content campaigns, to engage with brands in a way that allows funds to be earned as early as the first year of high school.
one_liner: College Cash uses everyday behavior to reduce student loan debt in a unique manner, including user-generated content campaigns, to engage with brands in a way that allows funds to be earned as early as the first year of high school.
